title: [Star Guardian Fan-work] PHYSICAL MODELLING OF THE IMPACTS OF AN ASTRONOMICAL FAMILIAR ON ADOLESC...

embed.description: PHYSICAL MODELLING OF THE IMPACTS OF AN ASTRONOMICAL FAMILIAR ON ADOLESCENT SUBJECT 20 Little Witch Eve, BV Nidalee's Elite, League of Legends Advisor: Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger Author's Note Submission for Star Guardian Fan-Work Contest Intro...

body:
Hiya :)

This is my unique take on fan work for **Star Guardian Evelynn**, which explains how her Star Guardian powers make her stealth work (including turning visible near champions), since I'm literally not good at any other creative medium xD

Also, to anyone wondering: I'm calling her Subject 20 because of being 20th in the list of released champions. I know she was release with others, but on that particular date, they were listed alphabetically.

Thanks :)

replies.body:
Oh my god, you actually did it...

Will definitely have to give this a read tomorrow, when I'm not so tired.

*Gasp*
Were you doubting me the whole time? :P

A little bit, yes.

I was under the impression that you were just getting a feel for how far Riot was willing to let the whole "choice of medium" thing go.

I'm glad you went through with it, though. It's a really ingenious idea, something that, in all likelihood, no one else even considered.
